Description: Verify new folder creation and nesting of new folders.

Verify that browser contents can be dragged to
      a Composer or Compose Mail window.

Confirm that text, links, and images dragged to a
      non-modal dialog are handled properly

Determine if the application and OS properly
      handle items dragged from the Bookmark Manager

Verify that you can save a form's data from the
      popup dialog box and you click yes.
Determine whether Security and Privacy displays correctly

Determine whether Netscape Technical Support displays
        correctly
Determine whether a page with frames prints properly
Determine if  large page print properly
Determine whether drag-scrolling gestures function properly.
Verify that nothing changes when you cancel

Visually inspect menu bar, floating component bar and all the
        tool bars

Verify that a folder added to the personal toolbar functions
        properly.
